description: This rule looks for Windows Installer service (msiexec.exe) trying to install MSI packages with SYSTEM privilege Author: Teymur Kheirkhabarov (idea), Mangatas Tondang (rule), oscd.community. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Always Install Elevated Windows Installer
query: ((process.executable:*\\Windows\\Installer\\* AND process.executable:*msi* AND process.executable:*tmp AND user.name:(NT\ AUTHORITY\\SYSTEM* OR AUTORITE\ NT\\Sys*)) OR ((process.executable:*\\msiexec.exe AND user.name:(NT\ AUTHORITY\\SYSTEM* OR AUTORITE\ NT\\Sys*) AND IntegrityLevel:"System") AND (NOT (process.command_line:*\\system32\\msiexec.exe\ \/V OR process.parent.command_line:*\\system32\\msiexec.exe\ \/V))))
